name: Gift of the Moon
summary: You can share your power with others, but they can't escape the werecreature's curse as easily as you can.
description:
You can share your power with others, but they can't escape the werecreature's curse as easily as you can. You can cast a 5th-level moon frenzy as a primal innate spell once per day. At 15th level, you cast a 6th-level moon frenzy instead. At 17th level, your 6th-level moon frenzy grants its standard effects, except the temporary Hit Points increase to 15 and the silver weakness increases to 15. At 20th level, you cast a 10th-level moon frenzy instead. The spell uses your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.Traits

Beastkin: Humanoids that can partially or fully transform into animal forms.
